_header: Think oft mid sorrow of heart o thine sin
_description: A warning, inserted in the Ancrene Riwle, and also found separately — six lines

BodEngPoeta1.Transcription:
Þenk ofte with sor of þyne schome synneÞenk on helle
                    wo of heuene riches wynneÞenk on þin owne deþ on Godes
                    deþ on RodeÞe grimme doom on domes day mung ofte in
                    moodeÞenk hou fals is þis world wȝuche beoþ hire
                    meedenÞenk what þu owest god for his goode deden

BLAru507.Transcription:
Thynk oft with sar hart of þi foule sinnesThynk oft of helle waa
                    of heuen riche wynnesThynk of þi aune dede of goddis dede on
                    rodeÞe grymme dome of domysday haue þu oft in modeThyn how
                    fals is þis warlde & what is his medeThynk what þu haufte god
                    for his gode dede
